entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
